docs.abstract: IBM and Facebook are forming a marketing partnership. It combines their data skills to help retailers and consumer brands move toward personalized marketing.
docs.snippet: IBM and Facebook are forming a marketing partnership. It combines their data skills to help retailers and consumer brands move toward personalized marketing.
docs.lead_paragraph: Personalized marketing — the product pitch or message that really hits its target, the right person at the right time — is the much-discussed ideal in advertising and sales.

headline.main: IBM and Facebook in Marketing Partnership

docs.abstract: Apple, IBM and Japan Post are partnering to provide a technology service for older adults. The venture reflects the larger ambitions of each company.
docs.snippet: Apple, IBM and Japan Post are partnering to provide a technology service for older adults. The venture reflects the larger ambitions of each company.
docs.lead_paragraph: Japan is an incubator of aging. More than other countries, it is a graying nation. Twenty-five percent of its population, or 33 million people, is age 65 or older, more than double the global average.

headline.main: Apple, IBM and Japan Post See Profit in the Old-Age Market

docs.abstract: Ms. Ruderman, a vice president and chief financial officer for IBM Latin America, keeps an open mind and an open office.
docs.snippet: Ms. Ruderman, a vice president and chief financial officer for IBM Latin America, keeps an open mind and an open office.

headline.main: Natalia Maria Ruderman of IBM: A Sweet Spot for Global Traditions
headline.print_headline: A Sweet Spot for Global Traditions
